titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to conduct a study of the Brooklyn waterfront, New York City, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 7/28/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to study the feasibility of establishing a major container feeder port at the Brooklyn waterfront, New York City, New York.
